content: I think it'd be super useful if something like @rustbot subscribe library/core/src/fmt would make the bot ping me on every PR that changes something in that file/folder. The high five bot already has that with a static configuration, but that isn't used much. If it was more dynamic, I'd probably use it a lot while working on a large change to some part of the code.
Do the bots have any persistent state right now?
I think triagebot has some persistent state
I know triagebot has a database to keep track of people's notifications for triage.rust-lang.org/notifications?user=username
yep, triagebot has full access to a postgres db, we can stash any needed state there
